translations: 碎步疾跑；（凿穿船底或打开通海阀）使沉船（scuttle 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Since he is only seen scuttling between his room and the library.
sentences.translation: 天天只见他在宿舍和图书馆之间穿梭。

sentences.sentence: He has repeatedly insisted that he has no intention of scuttling any more of GM's eight surviving car brands.
sentences.translation: 他一再坚持，他不想通用的八个品牌受损。

sentences.sentence: What will not help is scuttling from Iraq before exhausting every possible effort to put the country back together.
sentences.translation: 在保持统一的伊拉克的每一个可能努力用完之前美国不应当逃避。
